Csaba Hoch "Main page" [homepage, prop, reviewed] <hh/472> <root> (2009-08-04) 
Currently the intro page has these items:

   * Screenshots
   * Tutorial
   * Detailed introduction and documentation
   * Download page

I propose writing "Main page" instead of "Detailed introduction and
documentation". Sometimes less is more: visitors should feel
comfortable in the web page, and if we say "this is the main page",
they will comprehend the site's structure more easily.
Csaba Hoch — <hh/473> <↑hh/472> (2009-08-04)
